name: TÜV SÜD AG
goal: Ziel des TÜV SÜD ist es den Menschen und die Umwelt vor den negativen Auswirkungen der Technik zu schützen.
interests: Environment, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
• Proposal for a Regulation on the approval and market surveillance of motor vehicles and their trailers as well as systems, components and separate technical units intended for such vehicles
• Modernizing the periodic emission test for motor vehicles
• Necessary regulations regarding autonomous driving
• Evaluation white paper transport
